_header: I wend to death a king iwis
Title(s): Dialogue between the Spearman Death and a king, a Knight and an Archbishop
Subjects: dialogues, death and man; illustrations, verse accompanying
_description: Dialogue between the Spearman Death and a king, a Knight and an Archbishop — three quatrains

BLCottFausBVI.First Lines: I wende to dede knight stithe in stourethurghe fyght in felde & wane þe floure…
BLCottFausBVI.Note: Formerly listed incorrectly as in London,  British Library Cotton Faustina B.VII; written in speech banners from the mouths of illustrated figures.

BLSto39.First Lines:
I wende to ded clerke full of skillÞat couth with word mate
                    men at will…
BLSto39.Last Lines:
…Beest ne foghel ne oþer wyghtBot I sal make þam
                    dedde
